trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>tem uma StylusPointCollection que contém <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>coletados de objetos de uma caneta e o digitalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a StylusPointCollection para personalizar o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um IEnumerable genérico do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPoints is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointsis .

trans-unit.source: The length of points is 0.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de points é 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The objects in stylusPoints have incompatible objects.
trans-unit.target: - ou - objetos no stylusPoints ter incompatível objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class with specified points.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe com pontos especificados.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um IEnumerable genérico do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que especifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: points is .
trans-unit.target: pointsis .

trans-unit.source: The length of points is 0.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de points é 0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that may initially contain the specified number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe que inicialmente pode conter o número especificado de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: When you use the StylusPointCollection constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o construtor StylusPointCollection para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, você especificar que ele tem `initialCapacity`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode adicionar mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> inicialmente pode conter.

trans-unit.source: initialCapacity is negative.
trans-unit.target: initialCapacityé negativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe que contém as propriedades especificadas no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>devem ter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>que seja compatível com `stylusPointDescription`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que especifica as propriedades adicionais armazenadas em cada <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: stylusPointDescription is .
trans-unit.target: stylusPointDescriptionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> classe que é o tamanho especificado e contém as propriedades especificadas no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>construtor para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>é criado com a capacidade para manter o número especificado de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar mais <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos que `initialCapacity` chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que especifica as propriedades adicionais armazenadas em cada <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> inicialmente pode conter.

trans-unit.source: initialCapacity is negative.
trans-unit.target: initialCapacityé negativo.

trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains copies of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém cópias do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos no atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A posição na qual inserir o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> para inserir o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O de stylusPoint não é compatível com o propriedade.

trans-unit.target: indexé maior ou igual ao número de objetos no .

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*> property.
trans-unit.target: Localiza a interseção de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description*>

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`é um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>que descreve um subconjunto de valores que pertencem ao <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>método para obter uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>que faz interseção com a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>do atual <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O método de reformatação retorna uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>que contém os mesmos <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos como pertencente ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos no novo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>usa `subsetToReformatTo` como <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Reformatar usa as restrições do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>propriedade, mesmo se as restrições em `subsetToReformatTo` são diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `subsetToReformatTo` usa os valores 0 e 1023 para <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>enquanto <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>usa os valores 0 e 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Reformatar retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>usando os valores 0 e 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> a interseção com a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that has a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que tem um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que é um subconjunto de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> usa.

trans-unit.source: subsetToReformatTo is not a subset of the property.
trans-unit.target: subsetToReformatTonão é um subconjunto do propriedade.

trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> na posição especificada do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> is connected to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> and there is only one <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> está conectado a um <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> e há apenas um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Converte os valores de propriedade de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos em uma matriz de inteiro de 32 bits.
